this_title: NO ES LA MÁS FUERTE, ES LA ÚLTIMA EN CAER.
introduction: 克里斯安蒂和约马里斯是两名拳击手，她们将讲述自己在这项“男子运动”中经历的所有磨砺。这部纪录片试图为那些看起来离“坚韧、强壮、肌肉发达”相差甚远的选手发声。重要的不是谁打出最重的一拳，而是谁最后一个倒下。Krisandy and Yormarys are two boxers who will tell us about all the adversities they have gone through to have a consolidated position in a men's sport. This documentary seeks to give a voice to those who look different from the tough, muscular and strong boxer. It's not about the hardest hitter, it's about the last one to fall.
foreign_title: NO ES LA MÁS FUERTE, ES LA ÚLTIMA EN CAER.
